name: Piece of Memory 2:Prologue
description: "Piece of memory2 prologue" is the sequel of "Piece of memory". You can play without completing "Piece of memory", but in order to understand and enjoy the background, we recommend to play and complete "Piece of memory" first.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8,Windows 7,Windows Vista Processor: Core 2 Duo or more Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GT630 or more DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 320 MB available space Sound Card: Required
